title: Internet went out, and now I have a delayed queue.
body: Sup riot games. Not sure if this was your intention, but my internet went out, afkd for like, 5 minutes, and logged back into the game. Now i have a 5 game 10 minute wait queue. Can you fix this please? I understand the leaverbuster system may be automated, but since i logged back in idk why i got punished :( thanks

replies.body: Oh snap that sucks! There's not a lot we can do about your internet going out. Keep in mind that the 5 minutes you were gone was probably a big deciding factor in how the game went overall, and those 4 teammates were stuck trying to hold their own without a 5th member.

they were my friends from high school. they could care less. in fact, theyre upset that it happened because now they all have to wait 10 minutes to play with me. I hope your not a riot moderator, because that was the most disrespectful dgaf response of all time. I know the games been out for a long time, but please continue to care for the community.
